pageTitle: Camilla Skovgaard Cage Leg Sandals | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Shaft: 6in / 15cm Platform: 1in / 25mm Heel: 4.75in / 120mm MEASUREMENTS This item cannot be gift-boxed. Imported, China. Leather: Calfskin. The sleek cage shaft of these stiletto sandals lends a cool, sexy edge to the daring silhouette. A slim strap reaches over the vamp, and a hidden zip secures the inner side. Rubber platform and covered stiletto heel. Leather sole. Description Shoes > What's New > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Danish designer Camilla Skovgaard studied couture in Paris and by age 20 was brought to Dubai to design for the Gulf Sheikhs' wives and daughters. Skovgaard later studied at Cordwainers, where she perfected her trade, learning how to make shoe patterns, cut leather, and close uppers. Her line is celebrated for its high quality and fluid style. Chic and feminine with graceful silhouettes and innovative detailing, Camilla Skovgaard shoes are truly for the "intelligent fashionista." Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
